title: Cacio e Pepe Brussels Sprouts
directions: Preheat the oven to 375°F. On a baking sheet, toss together the brussels sprouts, butter, olive oil and ½ cup of the cheese; season with salt and pepper. Spread out in an even layer.
Roast the brussels sprouts until tender and lightly golden, 17 to 20 minutes.
Top the brussels sprouts with the remaining ¼ cup cheese and more pepper, to taste.
ingredients: 1½ pounds brussels sprouts, trimmed and halved
¾ cup finely grated Pecorino Romano or Parmesan cheese, divided
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
